subHeading: Top California Law Firm for Dentists
valueProp: Odgers Law Group is a premier dental law firm specializing exclusively in transactional dental services, providing expert legal guidance for dentists at all career stages.

testimonalData.text: Matt and his team helped me while transitioning dental practices and did an excellent job!
testimonalData.author: Dr. Alexander Hall

testimonalData.text: Odgers Law Group did our contract for our dental practice buy-in. He represented both the buyer and seller in our case as we didn't want an attorney to attorney tug-a-war.
testimonalData.author: Dr. McDonald

testimonalData.text: Odgers Law Group did a fantastic job with our dental office transition. We could not have done it without him.
testimonalData.author: Dr. Ron Barry
